title: Armchair
credit_line: Ailsa Mellon Bruce Fund and Berdan Memorial Trust Fund
provenance_text: Mr. Henry Osborne Havemeyer (1847-1907) and Mrs. Louisine Havemeyer (1855 - 1929), ca.1891/2 until 1929. Sale, American Art Association, New York, 22 Apr. 1930, no. 3841, lot 47. Lillian Nassau LLC, New York, early 1960s; Peter Grant, London, early 1960s-1992; Paul Reeves Limited, London, 1992; Margot Johnson, New York, 1992; The Louis C. Tiffany Garden Museum, Matsue, Japan, 1992 until 2013; sale, Michaan’s Auction’s, Alameda, CA, May 2013. Margot Johnson, New York, 2014 until May 7, 2015; Museum purchased from Margot Johnson, May 7, 2015.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
New York City (New York state, United States)
